portfolioProjects.title: Exam Quiz Master
portfolioProjects.description: Exam Quiz Master is a user-friendly web application for creating, managing, and taking quizzes.
features: Dashboard: Track created quizzes, total quizzes taken, average scores, and quiz results.
Quiz Creation: Create and manage multiple-choice quizzes with custom titles and descriptions.
Instant Feedback: Receive scores immediately upon submission, with a review option to see correct and incorrect answers.
Future updates will introduce AI-generated quizzes and sharable quiz links, enhancing accessibility and ease of use.

portfolioProjects.title: Water Refilling MS
portfolioProjects.description: Water Refilling Management System is a management platform for water refilling stations, enabling sales tracking, jar type management, customizable sales reports, and system branding for efficient, streamlined operations.
features: Sales Tracking: Record and monitor daily sales, including customer details, transaction type (walk-in/delivery), jar type, quantity, and payment status.
Jar Type Management: Add and update jar types and pricing for flexible inventory control.
Sales Reporting: View, filter, and print detailed sales reports by customer, type, and date range.
System Customization: Personalize the system with station branding, including name, short name, and logo.

portfolioProjects.title: Barangay Management System
portfolioProjects.description: A web application that allows barangay officials to manage their records and services efficiently.
